Entries.Mike: Wow! Thanks! This is wonderful. How did you know I love this? You are the best!/192 210 213 342 636/Thanks, I really appreciate this./233 194/Okay...?/728/What is this? It looks disgusting./219/Oh, Thank you.//

Entries.Mike0: I never expected for this day to come. I am so happy that it came with you!$l
Entries.Mike1: @, you can't imagine how happy I am. I am so thankful for this to happen.

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Mike: You want to watch a movie with me? I would love to go!$h#$e#This is amazing! We will have so much fun tonight. I'll meet you at the theater soon.$h

Entries.mike_read: %Mike is too focused on his study to notice you.
Entries.mike_school: %Mike is gone to college. He dropped some of his utensils on the ground.
Entries.mike_guitar: Hey @, I am learning to play guitar. Just give me some time, I will play a song for you!$h

Entries.Mike0: I never expected for this day to come. I am so happy that it came with you!$l
Entries.Mike1: @, you can't imagine how happy I am. I am so thankful for this to happen.

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Mike... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Mike in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.Mon: Mike is my nephew. He is here with me for college. I am proud of him. He is pretty brilliant if you ask me.$h

Entries.Wed2: Mike loves hashbrown. He finished all we had yesterday. But he seems to skip meals whenever we have trout soup.

Entries.Mon2: Mike is a genius. He fixed my camera the other day. I am glad he was able to help me.$h

Entries.Tue2: Mike is seems like a sweetheart. He gets me some materials that I need from the city once in a while.$h
Entries.Tue6: Mike is one of my few good friends.#$b#But I rarely seem him. He is busy with school most of the time.$s
Entries.Sun2: Mike got be a scupting knife the other day from the city. It works really well.$h
Entries.Sun4: I always forget to write a thank you note for Mike. He does a lot for me.$h

Entries.Mike: I don't exactly enjoy getting wet but rain keeps you thinking.#$b#Wow, it is getting cold. Maybe I will ask Uncle Gus for a hot cup of coffee.

Entries.68260001/f Mike 500/t 1200 2000/u 26/z s: playful/-100 -100/farmer 23 29 0 Mike 26 22 2 Gus 29 38 0/skippable/viewport 26 23 true/textAboveHead Mike "*Sniff*"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -7 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Mike 3/emote Mike 28/speak Mike "Hello, @... I am sorry for the late notice but there is no party today.$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 2000/speak Mike "It's not a big deal. Gus got too sick this morning and couldn't take my orders for the party.$s#$b#He got super exhuasted from Luau but continued to overwork. He says he just needs some time to recover.$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 200/faceDirection Mike 3/pause 500/emote Mike 16/speak Mike "Oh! Don't worry. He said that he will be back for this afternoon. You will still be able to buy a drink or two. It's just that...#$b#Well, I was pretty excited about this.$s"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 1000/speak Mike "Thanks for coming though. You made me feel better."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/emote Mike 16/move Gus 0 -16 3/faceDirection Mike 1/speak Gus "Mike! I have been looking for you. I am sorry about what happened today.#$b#Would you forgive me? I made you hashbrowns! I also got some pickles from Evelyn and peaches from Pierre.$h"/pause 1000/speak Mike "It's alright. @ here helped me to feel better. And afterall, birthdays come back.$h#$b#Do you feel better though?"/pause 500/speak Gus "Never been better.$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 500/textAboveHead Gus "Happy Birthday!"/pause 1000/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/emote Mike 20/pause 1000/friendship Mike 50/end

Entries.68260002/f Mike 1000/p Mike/w rainy: rain/-100 -100/farmer 45 18 2 Mike 46 22 2/skippable/viewport 46 22 true/textAboveHead Mike "Hmm..."/pause 500/move farmer 0 4 2/pause 500/faceDirection Mike 3/emote Mike 16/pause 500/speak Mike "Hey, @! It's nice to see you here.$h"/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 1000/speak Mike "I was just enjoying the ocean. I got some snack too. Do you want some? I guess you can call it a rainy picnic.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "Here you go."/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 500/farmerEat 213/emote Mike 16/pause 500/animate Mike false false 100 40 40 40 40 40 40 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 42 42 42 42 42 42 43/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "Wow, that was quick. I am guessing you like tacos?#$b#I do too! I made it myself. I used my mom's recipe.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 3/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 1000/emote Mike 40/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/stopMusic/playSound ocean/pause 2000/speak Mike "I would be lying if I said I don't miss my family back home... I mean Uncle Gus is with me but...$s"/pause 2000/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "Did you know that I have six siblings? It's quite a change being here alone.$h"/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 2000/speak Mike "Well, I am not much of an interesting guy. I had a decent childhood and there was never much trouble in my life."/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "You might think I am boring, and maybe that's true. I just struggle with things that everyone struggles with.#$b#Like wondering what to do with my life and missing my family when I am far away from them."/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 2/pause 2000/speak Mike "I probably should be heading back by now. I got some work to get done. Thanks for listening to me.$h"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Mike 0/move Mike 0 -4 0/faceDirection Mike 2/speak Mike "Are you coming with me?$h"/faceDirection farmer 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 1000/friendship Mike 50/end

Entries.68260003/f Mike 1500/w sunny/t 1200 2000: playful/-100 -100/farmer 14 24 0 Mike 16 20 2 Gus 15 18 2/skippable/showFrame Mike 32/viewport 16 20 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 500/speak Mike "Hello, @. Glad to see you!$h"/pause 800/speak Mike "@, remember how I told you that I will play a song for you?#$b#Well, I am not too good but I learned how to play a song.#$b#And I want to play it for you right now.$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Mike "Okay. I might make a mistake but you got to forgive me.$s#$b#One, two, three."/animate Mike false false 200 32 32 32 33 33 33 32 32 32 33 33 33 32 32 32 33 33 33 32 32 32 33 33 33 32 32 32 33 33 33 32 32 32 33 33 33/emote Mike 56/pause 5000/emote farmer 20/pause 2000/speak Mike "Thanks for listening. I will keep on practicing other songs.$h#$b#Hey, since you've been a great audience, I will get you a drink.$h"/pause 1000/emote farmer 56/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 1 0 1/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/farmerEat 350/pause 3000/message "Well, that was fun!"/end

Entries.68260004/f Mike 2000/o Mike/w sunny: continue/-100 100/farmer 49 39 0 Mike 49 32 2/skippable/showFrame Mike 21/viewport 49 32 true/textAboveHead Mike "I got this...!"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 500/emote Mike 16/pause 500/speak Mike "@! I have been waiting for you. I mean... I have something to tell you.$l"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Mike "I... well, I...#$b#I like you! I want to get to know you better.$l#$b#I like the way you talk to me and I like how you show that you care.#$b#You have been a huge encouragement to me whenever I was having a rough day. You are a great friend, and now I am wishing for more.#$b#You know what I mean? I am asking you out, silly.$u"/pause 500/animate Mike false false 500 22 22 22 22 22 22 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 22 22 22 22 22 22/showFrame Mike 23/pause 5000/speak Mike "It's a bouquet. I got it for you.#$b#If you feel the same way towards me, please give it to me. However if you don't feel the same way as me...#$b#Well, you can throw it away for me.$s#$b#Here you go, @. [458]"/showFrame Mike 21/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Mike "I will give you some time to think. Bring it to me whenever you feel ready.#$b#See you around.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 2000/end

Entries.68260005/f Mike 2500/o Mike/t 2000 2600: nightTime/16 20/farmer 14 24 0 Mike 16 20 2/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 500/speak Mike "Hey @, want to go somewhere with me?$u"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Mike "It's going to be great. Trust me.$h#$b#I have been wanting to do this with you for a while.$l"/emote Mike 32/pause 1000/move Mike 0 1 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianRide/ambientLight 0 0 0/specificTemporarySprite sebastianRide/pause 5000/viewport 15 8 true/speak Mike "You didn't know I can ride, did you? It is one of my secret hobbies.$h#$b#I am not too close with Sebastian, but we go on a ride together sometimes.#$b#I already told him that I am planning to ride tonight.#$b#Don't you just love the breeze?$l"/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianMountain/ambientLight 0 0 0/warp farmer 15 18/warp Mike 16 18/positionOffset farmer 0 16/playMusic spaceMusic/viewport 15 14 clamp true/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Mike 0/pause 500/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "Isn't it beautiful? I come up here once in a while whenever I feel overwhelmed."/faceDirection Mike 0/pause 1000/speak Mike "You know, @... I was pretty lost in life when I first met you.#$b#I always worked hard, but never knew where I was heading towards...#$b#But then you came along.$u#$b#You let me dream a future... well, with you.$l"/pause 500/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "@, I was wondering..."/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Mike "Do you dream your future with me?"/pause 3000/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Mike 0/speak Mike "You don't have to give an answer right now. Just give it a thought, okay?#$b#Well, @. Thanks for coming here with me. I am glad that we got to talk tonight.$l"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 2000/faceDirection Mike 3/pause 3000/emote Mike 60/speak Mike "@, you look beutiful tonight.$l"/pause 2000/speak Mike "Hey, @. Please look at me.$s"/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Mike 20/speak Mike "Don't move just yet.$l"/pause 2000/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 100/showFrame 101/emote Mike 16/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 3000/viewport move 1 -1 8000/pause 6000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Saloon/pause 4000/end position 14 23

Entries.68260006/f Mike 2500/O Mike: continue/-10000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Mike -100 -100 2/warp Mike -100 -100/warp farmer -100 -100/faceDirection Mike 2/viewport 64 15 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 64 15/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/playSound doorClose/warp Mike 64 15/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Mike "@! I wanted to tell you something. You know how I worked on a research with a professor?#$b#Well, I was wondering what I should do as I am going to graduate from college real soon and the professor that I worked with recommended me as an assistant professor.#$b#And guess what? I got the job! I am going to graduate school and work as an assistant professor at ZZU now. I will be gone to ZZU on Mondays and Wednesdays.$h#$b#Are you happy for me, babe?$l"/pause 1500/emote farmer 20/speak Mike "Aww, thanks for your support! Here, let me read you the letter I got.$h"/animate Mike false true 100 26 26 26 26 26 26 27 27 27 27 27 27 26 26 26 26 26 26/pause 2000/speak Mike "Dear Mr. Mike, It is an honor to inform you that you have been accepted to ZuZu University to work as an assistant professor.$7#$b#We will be supporting you through graduate school as in replacement for your salary.$7#$b#We are looking forward to work with you. Sincerely, ZuZu University.$7"/stopAnimation Mike 0/pause 500/speak Mike "Isn't that just amazing? Well, I hope you have a great day! See you in the evening!$h"/pause 1000/end

Entries.68260007/f Mike 3000/O Mike/t 700 1200: continue/-100 -100/farmer 14 20 0 Mike 8 11 2/skippable/showFrame Mike 34/viewport 11 13 true/animate Mike false true 200 34 34 34 35 35 35/move farmer 0 -7 0/move farmer -6 0 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/stopAnimation Mike 34/pause 1000/emote Mike 16/pause 1000/speak Mike "Hey, babe. I didn't know you were here!$h#$b#I was reading through a script. I have an important presentation today.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak Mike "@, don't worry. I will be fine.$u#$b#But is sure feels nice to see you care about me.$l"/pause 500/emote Mike 20/pause 1000/speak Mike "Well, I got to go now. I will miss you.$h"/pause 2000/end

Entries.68260008/f Mike 3500/O Mike/w sunny: continue/-100 -100/farmer 18 13 3 Mike 8 8 0/skippable/viewport 11 10 true/move farmer -10 0 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/move Mike 5 0 2/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/animate Mike false true 200 29 29 29 30 30 30 31 31 31/move farmer 0 -5 1/pause 1000/stopAnimation Mike 0/faceDirection Mike 3/emote Mike 16/move Mike -3 0 3/pause 1000/speak Mike "@! You seem pretty confused.$h#$b#I was taking some pictures of these ancient buildings for examples to use in the class I am teaching.#$b#It is to see mathematics in architecture...#$b#Oh, sorry. That was pretty boring.$h#$b#Well, I am basically done. Do you want to take a walk with me?$l"/move Mike -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 2/move Mike 0 10 2/move farmer 0 10 2/viewport 11 19 true/pause 3000/speak Mike "@, I can't fully explain how much you mean to me.$l#$b#You have been a wonderful to me every day and I know that I wouldn't have made it through without you.$l#$b#So, thank you."/pause 2000/speak Mike "Hey, let me take a picture of you so I can look at it whenever I miss you during work.$l"/pause 1000/move Mike 0 -3 3/move Mike -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 2000/speak Mike "Okay, smile!$h"/animate Mike false false 200 29 29 29 30 30 30 31 31 31 29 29 29 30 30 30 31 31 31/pause 1000/speak Mike "You look beautiful, @!$h"/pause 2000/move Mike 0 2 2/move Mike -1 0 3/move Mike 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Mike 1/pause 2000/speak Mike "I love you, @."/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike 2 0/pause 100/showFrame Mike 28/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote Mike 20/pause 3000/viewport move 1 -1 8000/pause 6000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.Mike: This punch is real nice! Wow, I wonder what they put in this?#$e#Hey, you should get some too!$h
Honey, the punch is very sweet. It tastes great just like you!$h
I am not a dancer, but it looks romantic for sure.
The soup smells really nice! Hope you don't make a naughty choice.$u
Entries.Mike_spouse: Soup! Are we going to put in anything?#$e#Hmm, that sounds exciting.$h

Entries.Mike: I am so ready for this. It is going to look marvelous!$h
Entries.Mike_spouse: Babe, don't fall asleep yet. You are going to miss out on the great scene!$s

Entries.Mike: The moonlight jellies are almost as beautiful as you.$l
Hey, this is exciting! What should I do first?$h
Entries.Mike_spouse: Honey! What do you want to do?$h

Entries.Mike: Today was a great day. Fun, wasn't it?
Okay, I am not a big fan of this kind of stuff.$a
How many fish will you catch?
You got this! I believe in you!$h
This is my favorit holiday! Everything is so perfect, isn't it?$h
You know, today is my favorite holiday and you make it even more perfect. Thank you.$l

Entries.mikebirthday: Hello, @.^^I am going to have a birthday party and I wanted to invite you.^^Come to town tomorrow afternoon. Hope to see you there!^^From, Mike[#]Mike's Birthday
